department.dept_long_name: Committee on the Study of Religion

course.title: Introduction to Buddhist Scriptures and Their Critical Interpretations
course.description: An introduction to basic issues in the contemporary understanding of textuality, history, and interpretation and their relevance to the study of Buddhist scriptures. Examples of Buddhist scriptures will be drawn primarily from the Mahayana traditions.
course.notes: //Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 3836.
